name: @cycjimmy/awesome-js-funcs
description: Personal collection of javascript functions often used.

scripts.transform2cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=cjs npx babel dist/esm --out-dir dist/cjs --out-file-extension .cjs
scripts.build: npm run lint:fix && trash dist && npm run babel && npm run transform2cjs
scripts.package: npm run build && node modifyPackage.js && gulp copy:package

author: cycjimmy <cycjimmy@gmail.com> (https://github.com/cycjimmy)
